definition[0]: to push someone or something in a rough or careless way, using your hands or shoulders
example[0]: He shoved her towards the car.
example[1]: Everyone was pushing and shoving to see the prince.
definition[1]: to put something somewhere carelessly or without thinking much
example[2]: Tidying the room seems to mean shoving everything under the bed!
example[3]: He shoved his hands into his pockets.
definition[2]: used to tell someone in a very impolite way that you do not want something
example[4]: They can take their three cents an hour raise and shove it.
example[5]: Give the door a good shove.
